testcase.name: Comprar album con usuario regular exitoso
testcase.system-out: * def urlBase = 'https://nodejs-qa-training.herokuapp.com/' ............... passed * def headerContentType = 'application/json' .............................. passed * def jsonAutenticacion = call read('listar_albumes.feature@ExitosoRegular') . passed * def varAuthorization = jsonAutenticacion.jsonAutenticacion.responseHeaders.Authorization[0] . passed * def totalIdAlbum = jsonAutenticacion.response.length .................... passed * def obtenerIdAlbum = function(max) { return Math.floor(Math.random() * max) } . passed * def idAlbum = obtenerIdAlbum(totalIdAlbum) .............................. passed Given url urlBase + 'albums/' + idAlbum ................................... passed And header Content-Type = headerContentType ............................... passed And header Authorization = varAuthorization ............................... passed And request {} ............................................................ passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 201 ........................................................... passed * print response .......................................................... passed
